MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Infested Submarine
MonsterMission.description: Scouts have reported of a large Wrecked Carrier that has been taken over by infestated growth. It is now still moving around [location1] and [location2] and the authorities are offering a reward of [reward] to any submarine that takes out the mobile thalamus. Be warned that it has a hook on its front side and must be approached carefully.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The ship has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Infested Submarine
MonsterMission.description: Scouts have reported of a large Wrecked Carrier that has been taken over by infestated growth. It is now still moving around [location1] and [location2] and the authorities are offering a reward of [reward] to any submarine that takes out the hermit, Be warned that initial thalamus reports were incorrect and it is some kind of clawed crab like creature.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The ship has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Beast from the Abyss
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings are indicating that something colossal has emerged from the depths of Europa into the passageway between [location1] and [location2]. All transports through the passageway have been canceled for now and a reward of [reward] has been promised to those who get rid of whatever is causing the seismic activity.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Leviathan is dead and the passageway is open for transport again.

message.text: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Kill a Moloch
MonsterMission.description: A recent clearing operation went wrong when the Attack ship shot a nuclear shell at a Moloch and the shell got stuck inside its core and didn't detonate. The Attack ship fled the scene however the Injured Moloch still wanders the area dangerously with an active nuclear shell inside it. Authorities are willing to pay [reward] marks to anyone that could kill the creature, and keep your distance from it!

MonsterMission.name: Investigate a Floral Growth
MonsterMission.description: The Station Administrator reports sightings of a large mobile Thalamus hunting vessel between [location1] and [location2]. They offer you [reward] to eliminate the threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigate a Floral Growth
MonsterMission.description: The Station Administrator reports sightings of a large mobile Thalamus hunting vessel between [location1] and [location2]. They offer you [reward] to eliminate the threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigate a Floral Growth
MonsterMission.description: The Station Administrator reports sightings of a large mobile Thalamus hunting vessel between [location1] and [location2]. They offer you [reward] to eliminate the threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Destroy a Fractal Sentry
MonsterMission.description: A Fractal Sentry has metastasized from the structure of a local ruin, it has now became a extremely dangerous threat towards traveling ships. [location1] will reward anyone for [reward] marks towards whoever could destroy the Sentry between [location1] and [location2].
MonsterMission.successmessage: The representative from [location1] thanks you for your bravery and compensate you with a large bounty of [reward] marks.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Destroy a Pylon
MonsterMission.description: A Fractal Pylon has metastasized from the structure of a local ruin, it has now became a dangerous threat towards traveling ships. [location1] will reward anyone for [reward] marks towards whoever could destroy the Sentry between [location1] and [location2].
MonsterMission.successmessage: The representative from [location1] thanks you for your bravery and compensate you with a large bounty of [reward] marks.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging a Derelict
MonsterMission.description: A medium-sized cargo submarine, went missing two months ago between [location1] and [location2].while the vessel was presumed to be taken by the abyss,the vehicle's and the crew's emergency beacons were recently activated, A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to any crew who can investigate the beacon.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The researchers of [location1] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you [reward] Marks as "reimbursement for your troubles".

message.text: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but it seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Terminate Cnidae
MonsterMission.description: An aggressive triumverate of gas producing Cnidae is disrupting the route between [location1] and [location2],A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate the threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Cnidae has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Beast From the Abyss
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings are indicating that something colossal has emerged from the depths of Europa. A reward of [reward] has been promised to those who get rid of whatever is causing the seismic activity.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Endworm has been terminated.

message.text: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Beast From the Abyss
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings are indicating that something colossal has emerged from the depths of Europa. A reward of [reward] has been promised to those who get rid of whatever is causing the seismic activity.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Endworm has been terminated.

message.text: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Injured Dispatch
MonsterMission.description: An assault vessel managed to target and severely wound a Latcher in the Abyss however it managed to escape from the crew and is now fleeing around the path at [location1] and [location2] and could be still dangerous. Station administrators are offering a shared reward of [reward] to whoever can finish it off, the rest of the money will go to the first Assault vessel that wounded it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Latcher has been terminated.

message.text: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Kill a Husk Immortal
MonsterMission.description: An Anomalous Husk cultist has appeared between [location1] and [location2]. Rarely found operating in open water, They will no doubt be accompanied by other husk creatures in persuit of their alien goals. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew brave enough confront them and administer lethal justice.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Immortal has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Dybbuk
MonsterMission.description: A particurarly aggressive Dybbuk has been causing severe psychological damage to nearby vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Dybbuk has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate Dyatel
MonsterMission.description: A particurarly aggressive group of Dyatel, Speculated to be Dybbuk's larval form, have left the abyss and are targeting vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate them.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Dyatel have been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Slay a Baby Charybdis
MonsterMission.description: A Baby Charybdis has been attacking vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Baby Charybdis has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Slay an Anomalous Moloch
MonsterMission.description: A Peculiar Moloch specimen has been spotted between [location1] and [location2]. Its aggressive nature has been detrimental to the trading routes,and as such, a reward of [reward] marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Moloch has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Kill a Scavenger
MonsterMission.description: A rogue Scavenger is wandering around the area between [location1] and [location2], The authorities are awarding a small sum of [reward] marks to anyone who eliminates it. Anyone that kills the deadly creature will also be free to keep whatever they found on it
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Scavenger have been terminated.

message.text: The targets have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A small shipment of Ancient Brute Security Robots went gone missing between [location1] and [location2] ages ago.While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss, the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated.Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Brutes, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Brutes appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A large shipment of Ancient Brute Security Robots has gone missing between [location1] and [location2] long ago. While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss,the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated. Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Brutes, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Brutes appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A small shipment of Ancient Cargo Robots went gone missing between [location1] and [location2] ages ago.While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss, the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated.Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Luggars, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Luggars appear to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A large shipment of Ancient Cargo Robots has gone missing between [location1] and [location2] long ago. While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss,the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated. Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Luggars, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Luggars appear to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A large shipment of Ancient Cargo Robots has gone missing between [location1] and [location2] long ago. While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss,the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated. Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Luggars, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Luggars appear to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Kill the mysterious creature
MonsterMission.description: Various small vessels and drones have gone missing between [location1] and [location2].The only Witnesses suffer from heavy psychosis and hallucinations and thus we don't have a description of what's causing the disappereances,however a particular infrasonic signal has been marked as the prime suspect.Anyone willing to investigate the signal will be rewarded.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging a Derelict
MonsterMission.description: A small cargo vessel went missing approximately two months ago when transporting xenomaterials from [location1] to [location2]. The vessel was presumed to be taken by the abyss, but now its emergency beacon seems to have been activated near [location2]. Find the vessel and recover the cargo.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The researchers of [location2] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you 2000 credits as "reimbursement for your troubles".

message.text: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but it seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a large Shadow Whale swarm
MonsterMission.description: Scouts have reported of a large swarm of Shadow Whales wandering the area between [location1] and [location2]. These Whales are invisible on sonar and can pose a big threat towards unprepared ships. The authorities are offering a reward of [reward] to any submarine that takes out the large swarm.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: The Twins
MonsterMission.description: A week ago some divers uncovered a ruin between [location1] and [location2]. While they were inside, one of the divers recorded triggering some sort of mechanism and the entire ruin shook. The subs sonar captured a massive wave of sonar disruption and all their electronics were fried. Upon further investigation, the scientists at base realize the large level of disruption is still seen between the path at [location1] and [location2] and are offering [reward] towards anyone who is willing to investigate.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The cause of the massive sonar disruption was infact from two robotic Fractal Destroyers, the scientists are very excited to hear about your encounter.

message.text: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Ice Shark Pack
MonsterMission.description: Submarines travelling between [location1] and [location2] have reported being attacked by a pack of Ice Sharks. A bounty of [reward] marks has been posted for dealing with these aggressive predators.

MonsterMission.name: Gnasher School
MonsterMission.description: Submarines travelling between [location1] and [location2] have reported being harassed by a school of Gnashers. A bounty of [reward] marks has been posted for dealing with these annoying fish.

MonsterMission.name: Gnasher Swarm
MonsterMission.description: Submarines travelling between [location1] and [location2] have reported being damaged by a large swarm of Gnashers. A bounty of [reward] marks has been posted for preventing them from causing any more damage.

MonsterMission.name: Destroy Brain Moss
MonsterMission.description: Submarines passing between [location1] and [location2] have logged a radiation spikes consistant with a pack of the poorly understood Thalamus Brain Moss. The administrator has earmarked [reward] to whoever destroys these contaminated abberations.

MonsterMission.name: Brain Drain
MonsterMission.description: Submarines passing between [location1] and [location2] have been attacked by a large cluster of Thalamus Brain Moss organisms. A bounty of [reward] has been posted for their destruction.

MonsterMission.name: Barracuda School
MonsterMission.description: Submarianers traveling between [location1] and [location2] have sighted a small school of Barracuda. A small bounty of [reward] has been posted for their destruction since trophies from the caracasses are quite valueable.

MonsterMission.name: Large Barracuda School
MonsterMission.description: Submarianers traveling between [location1] and [location2] have encountered a dangerously large school of Barracuda. A bounty of [reward] has been posted for their destruction and the trophies from the caracasses are quite valueable.

MonsterMission.name: Hullfish School
MonsterMission.description: Submarines traveling between [location1] and [location2] have been damaged by a dangerously large school of Hullfish. A bounty of [reward] has been posted for their destruction due to economic damage.

MonsterMission.name: Massive Hullfish Swarm
MonsterMission.description: Submarines traveling between [location1] and [location2] have been heavily damage by a massives schools of Hullfish. A bounty of [reward] has been posted for their destruction due to severe economic damage.

MonsterMission.name: Kill Shrimp
MonsterMission.description: Submarines traveling between [location1] and [location2] have had operations disrupted by a group of shrimp, A reward of [reward] has been posted to exterminate them.

MonsterMission.name: Kill Shrimp
MonsterMission.description: Submarines traveling between [location1] and [location2] have had to abandon operations due to attacks by large groups of shrimp, A reward of [reward] has been posted to cull their numbers.

MonsterMission.name: Kill Mantids
MonsterMission.description: Submarines traveling between [location1] and [location2] have been accosted by a small coldwater mantis subspecies usually found in caves, A reward of [reward] has been posted to deal with them, but careful they pinch.

MonsterMission.name: Kill Mantids
MonsterMission.description: Submarines traveling between [location1] and [location2] have been accosted by a pack of rogue mantids outside of their usual range, A reward of [reward] has been posted to eliminate them.

MonsterMission.name: Kill A Bonethresher
MonsterMission.description: A rogue thresher pack led by a Bonethresher has been sighted between [location1] and [location2] well outside of their normal deeper biomes, A reward of [reward] has been posted to eliminate this unusual threat.

MonsterMission.successmessage: You've took care of those clowns. Hopefully they don't come back.
MonsterMission.description: Some filthy clowns have been causing some disruption around [location1] and [location2]. The authorities don't want to waste their time and are offering you [reward] if you could stop their shenanigans.
MonsterMission.name: Crowd Control

message.text: The Clowns have been taken care off, navigate the submarine towards the next area.

MonsterMission.successmessage: You've took care of those clowns. Hopefully they don't come back.
MonsterMission.description: Some filthy clowns have been causing some disruption around [location1] and [location2]. The authorities don't want to waste their time and are offering you [reward] if you could stop their shenanigans.
MonsterMission.name: Crowd Control

message.text: The Clowns have been taken care off, navigate the submarine towards the next area.

MonsterMission.successmessage: The Ice Crab swarm is gone. Navigate to the next area to claim your reward.
MonsterMission.description: A swarm of Ice Crabs have been sighted between [location1] and [location2], alongside a Giant Crab. Authorities are offering [reward] to whoever can eliminate them.
MonsterMission.name: Ice Crab Swarm

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Abyssal Hammerhead Herd
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive group of Abyssal Hammerheads have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Hammerheads have been killed.

message.text: The Hammerheads are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Abyssal Hammerhead Herd
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive group of Abyssal Hammerheads have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Hammerheads have been killed.

message.text: The Hammerheads are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.successmessage: The mines have successfully been destroyed.
MonsterMission.description: Some naval mines that were placed between the path from [location1] and [location2] have now been thrown off from their position and now dangerously roam the path. The administrators are offering [reward] to anyone who gets rid of these naval mines to allow commercial flights to enter the path safely again.
MonsterMission.name: Demining Operations

message.text: The mines that threatened the path have now been cleared and the path is now safe for travel again. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.successmessage: The mines have successfully been destroyed.
MonsterMission.description: Some naval mines that were placed between the path from [location1] and [location2] have now been thrown off from their position and now dangerously roam the path. The administrators are offering [reward] to anyone who gets rid of these naval mines to allow commercial flights to enter the path safely again.
MonsterMission.name: Demining Operations

message.text: The mines that threatened the path have now been cleared and the path is now safe for travel again. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.successmessage: The mines have successfully been destroyed.
MonsterMission.description: The authorities have detected a large formation of naval mines around [location1] and [location2]. These mines are unhooked and are purpously placed to destroy and disrupt a transportation route. The authorities are offering [reward] to anyone who could disarm or explode the mines in the area to resume commercial flights.
MonsterMission.name: Clearing a Massive Minefield

message.text: The mines that threatened the path have now been cleared and the path is now safe for travel again. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Purging a Husk Brood Nexus
MonsterMission.description: This area has become a nexus for husk activity. Biological readings suggest a considerable number of lifeform are gathering here,and particurlarly aggressive husk encounters recently manifested in the region. Researchers are offering [reward] Marks for anyone capable of eliminating the threats. Survival is not expected for anyone under-prepared
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Brood has been Purged.

message.text: The Brood has been Purged. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a pack of Cnidae
MonsterMission.description: An aggressive pack of Cnidae's is disrupting the route between [location1] and [location2],A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate the threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Cnidae has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Slay a pack of Baby Charybdis
MonsterMission.description: A pack of Baby Charybdis has been attacking vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate them.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Baby Charybdis's has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Scavenger Galore
MonsterMission.description: Some Scavengers established their territory between [location1] and [location2], and as such they developed an aggressive territorial behaviour, Anyone foolish enough to try and clear out the threat will be free to keep whatever they found
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Scavengers have been terminated.

message.text: The targets have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Large Thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of threshers has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report also the appearence of less-known thresher lifeforms. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Large Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A large swarm of Mudraptors has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Major Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of Mudraptors has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report also the presence of a veteran Mudraptor. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of Mudraptors has been rally up around [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report a large number of veteran Mudraptors. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Deadzone
MonsterMission.description: Subs have gone down between [location1] and [location2]. Recovered logbooks all report electrical phenomana, strange lights and phantom ruins in thier last entries. A massive reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew who can possibly deal with this lethal threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The threat has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of Threshers has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2], effectively stopping all commercial routes. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Harpoon whale trio.
MonsterMission.description: A trio of deadly harpoon whales are attacking traffic between [location1] and [location2], survivors of the attacks have posted a sizeable bounty of [reward] for killing the creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Harpoon Whales have been killed.

message.text: The Harpoon whales are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Harpoon whale trio.
MonsterMission.description: A trio of dangerous psilosaurs are stalking submarines between [location1] and [location2], survivors of attacks have posted a bounty of [reward] for killing the creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Psilosaurs have been killed.

message.text: The Psilosaurs are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Moloch Herd
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Moloch herd and their offspring have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Molochs have been killed.

message.text: The Molochs are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Moloch Herd
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Moloch and her offspring have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Molochs have been killed.

message.text: The Molochs are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing an Alpha Mudraptor brood
MonsterMission.description: A rarely seen Mudraptor Veteren of unusual size has attracted a massive brood that has begun preying on vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to anyone who can remove this threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Mudraptors have been killed.

message.text: The Ancient and its brood are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Stopping Unusual Mudraptor Attacks
MonsterMission.description: Unusual mudraptor attacks have been reportered between [location1] and [location2], the attacks came suddenly and without warning. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to anyone who can stop these creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Mudraptors have been killed.

message.text: The Night Raptor ambush has been dealt with. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Coelanth School removal
MonsterMission.description: A unusually large school of hostile xeno fish have begun hunting between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to anyone who can stop these creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Coelanth have been killed.

message.text: The Coelanth has been dealt with. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Hammerhead Pack
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Hammerhead pack has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Hammerheads have been killed.

message.text: The Hammerheads are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Hammerhead Pack
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Hammerhead pack has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Hammerheads have been killed.

message.text: The Hammerheads are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Matriarch
MonsterMission.description: Eliminate the Hammerhead Matriarch and her minions.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Matriarch has been eliminated.

message.text: The Matriarch is eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Matriarch Kingdom
MonsterMission.description: Eliminate the Hammerhead Matriarch and her kingdom of minions.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Matriarch Kingdom has been eliminated.

message.text: The Matriarch Kingdom is eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Seaurchin Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A large swarm of Seaurchin has been attacking vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can remove it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Major Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of crawlers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A Massive swarm of crawlers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Husk Crawler Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A Massive swarm of husk crawlers along with several larger anomolous contacts has been spotted by vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of mudraptors has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
A swarm of Veteran Mudraptors has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
A huge swarm of mudraptors has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
A small swarm of giant mudraptors has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
A huge swarm of threshers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
A massive swarm of threshers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.

MonsterMission.name: Clown Uprising
MonsterMission.description: The path between [location1] and [location2] have been a sight for a wave of brutal attacks from submarine crews over the past few days. Authorities reported that a clown syndicate is operating in the area and must be taken care of. They are offering [reward] for whoever can get rid of them.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The area now seems clear of any clowns in the area. Good work.

message.text: You've cleared the area of any tomfoolery. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Clown Uprising
MonsterMission.description: The path between [location1] and [location2] have been a sight for a wave of brutal attacks from submarine crews over the past few days. Authorities reported that a clown syndicate is operating in the area and must be taken care of. They are offering [reward] for whoever can get rid of them.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The area now seems clear of any clowns in the area. Good work.

message.text: You've cleared the area of any tomfoolery. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.description: The path between [location1] and [location2] have been a sight for a wave of brutal attacks from submarine crews over the past few days. Authorities reported that a clown syndicate is operating in the area and must be taken care of. They are offering [reward] for whoever can get rid of them.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The area now seems clear of any clowns in the area. Good work.

message.text: You've cleared the area of any tomfoolery. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Fractal Migration
MonsterMission.description: Divers reported a large column of Fractal inhabitants have escaped from a ruin and now dangerously roam the area between [location1] and [location2]. Administrators are offering [reward] for any armed submarine crew that could wipe out the roaming creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The area now seems clear of any fractal guardians in the area. Good work.

message.text: You've cleared the area of any fractal guardians. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Fractal Migration
MonsterMission.description: Divers reported a large column of Fractal inhabitants have escaped from a ruin and now dangerously roam the area between [location1] and [location2]. Administrators are offering [reward] for any armed submarine crew that could wipe out the roaming creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The area now seems clear of any fractal guardians in the area. Good work.

message.text: You've cleared the area of any fractal guardians. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Fractal Migration
MonsterMission.description: Divers reported a large column of Fractal inhabitants have escaped from a ruin and now dangerously roam the area between [location1] and [location2]. Administrators are offering [reward] for any armed submarine crew that could wipe out the roaming creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The area now seems clear of any fractal guardians in the area. Good work.

message.text: You've cleared the area of any fractal guardians. You should report the incident to [location2].

NestMission.name: Raiding a Huge Mudraptor Nest
NestMission.description: A large Mudraptor nest has been spotted around [location1] and [location2]. Sonar and heat seeking scanners revealed around over 10 mudraptors inside the cave and many eggs. Authorities estimate that without taking action for the next couple days, the outposts nearby the area will be overrun and abandoned. The Coalition hasn't taken action yet however the authorities are offering [reward] to whoever can exterminate the large nest. Expect high casualties and death.

NestMission.name: Clearing a Mudraptor Nest
NestMission.description: A large Mudraptor nest has been spotted around [location1] and [location2]. Sonar and heat seeking scanners revealed around over 10 mudraptors inside the cave and many eggs. Authorities estimate that without taking action for the next couple days, the outposts nearby the area will be overrun and abandoned. The Coalition hasn't taken action yet however the authorities are offering [reward] to whoever can exterminate the large nest. Expect high casualties and death.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate Husked Abyss Miners
MonsterMission.description: A mining crew was forced to leave the abyss after encountering multiple abyss entities, forcing them to leave their deep divers out in the open. Recently their beacon was activated and authorities suspect the divers have become infected and are rewarding [reward] to whoever can deal with this threat before another crew is lost.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The miners were forced to be taken out.

message.text: Looks like the mining crew were attacked and turned into husks. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to report the news.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate Husked Abyss Miners
MonsterMission.description: A mining crew was forced to leave the abyss after encountering multiple abyss entities, forcing them to leave their deep divers out in the open. Recently their beacon was activated and authorities suspect the divers have become infected and are rewarding [reward] to whoever can deal with this threat before another crew is lost.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The miners were forced to be taken out.

message.text: Looks like the mining crew were attacked and turned into husks. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to report the news.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating a mysterious distress beacon.
MonsterMission.description: Authorities have lost contact with a submarine a few weeks ago until now. When an SOS beacon was reported where the submarine was last seen around [location1] and [location2]. Authorities are rewarding [reward] to anyone who investigates the signal as they suspect the crew is now husks.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The husk swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
MonsterMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. You should report the incident to [location2].

message.text: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
MonsterMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. You should report the incident to [location2].

message.text: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
MonsterMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
MonsterMission.successmessage: It turns out the signal was emitted by a massive artifact. The researchers of [location1] have agreed to pay you the reward nevertheless for getting rid of the problem.

SalvageMission.name: Clown relic retrival
SalvageMission.description: Local clowns have posted a bounty to retrive a lost relic located near [location1], frustratingly they refuse to elaborate what the item is and the reward of [reward] is absurd, however directions to the wreck which hopefully has other salvage are quite clear.

SalvageMission.name: Husk icon recovery
SalvageMission.description: The Church of the Husk has issued a reward for a religious icon located on a vessal that went down between [location1] and [location2], For a cheaply made aluminum figurine they are offering a modest [reward] for its return.

AlienRuinClearMission.description: You must clear an alien ruin to allow researchers to advance their findings. Once done, return to the next location for your award.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

AlienRuinClearMission.description: A salvager team listed as KIA during a mission long ago to a ruin located near [location1] have suddenly had their distress beacon activated, leading to fears of fractal corruption. A reward of [reward] credits has been posted to put the issue to rest once more.

Reports of radio transmissions resembling singing coming from a ruin between [location1] and [location2] have resulted in several investigating teams going missing. A reward of [reward] credits has been issued to stop the source of the transmission.

MonsterMission.name: Trichordate Infestation
MonsterMission.description: A recent expedition has uncovered a large nest of rare Trichordate parasites in a cave between [location1] and [location2]. While individually weak, large swarms can overpower lone or unwary divers. as such [reward] has been allocated to pay whoever can clear out the infestation.

MonsterMission.name: Abyssal Ghost Shrimp swarm
MonsterMission.description: Passing Vessals have reported the distinctive popping noise emitted by a large group of abyssal Ghost Shrimp, coming from an abyssal region between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew that can clear this navigational hazard.

MonsterMission.name: Scavenger Hunt
MonsterMission.description: A cave containing a communal mix of bottom dwelling creatures has been located near [location1]. An unusually high reward of [reward] credits has been allocated to clear the infestation before it grows and risk of a reptillian Scavenger being responsible.

message.text: All of the creatures have been dealt with. Navigate the submarine out of the claim a well earned reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate Husked Miners
MonsterMission.description: A submarine crew lost contact from their forward mining group in a cave. With their ship damaged, they claim the mining groups beacon has been activated and suspect they have become husks. They're awarding [reward] marks to whoever can go remove them from the cave.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The miners were forced to be taken out. You inform the ships captain about their loss. They decided to reward you anyway.

message.text: Looks like the mining crew were attacked and turned into husks. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to report the news.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate Husked Miners
MonsterMission.description: A submarine crew lost contact from their forward mining group in a cave. With their ship damaged, they claim the mining groups beacon has been activated and suspect they have become husks. They're awarding [reward] marks to whoever can go remove them from the cave.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The miners were forced to be taken out.

message.text: Looks like the mining crew were attacked and turned into husks. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to report the news.

MonsterMission.name: Unusual Husk Activity
MonsterMission.description: Submarine crews have reported increased husk activity at a former dig site along with unusual sensor readings more consistant with ruins. Uneasy submarinars have understandably avoided the area and authorities eager to reopen the linea are awarding [reward] marks to whoever can go remove whatever is in the cave.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The miners were forced to be taken out.

message.text: You have stopped whatever this was. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to report the news.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating a mysterious signal
MonsterMission.description: A mysterious infrasonic signal has suddenly shown up around [location1]. Researchers want you to investigate the signal. Report back any findings.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. [location2] agreed to pay you [reward] for your discovery.

message.text: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. You should report the incident to [location2].

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

message.text: Wait, what was that noise?

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

message.text: Wait, what was that noise?

MonsterMission.name: Investigate a mysterious signal
MonsterMission.description: A mysterious infrasonic signal has suddenly shown up around [location1]. Researchers want you to investigate the signal. Report back any findings.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by a human through unknown sources. [location2] agreed to pay you [reward] for your discovery.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating a mysterious signal
MonsterMission.description: A mysterious infrasonic signal has suddenly shown up around [location1]. Researchers want you to investigate the signal. Report back any findings.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of mutant human. [location2] agreed to pay you [reward] for your discovery.

message.text: The creature is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating a mysterious distress beacon.
MonsterMission.description: Authorities have lost contact with a submarine a few weeks ago until now. An SOS beacon was reported where the submarine was last seen around [location1] and [location2]. Authorities are rewarding [reward] to anyone who investigates the signal.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The husk swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

message.text: The beacon station is back online. Make sure it stays transmitting, and navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.

MonsterMission.name: Latcher Sighting
MonsterMission.description: Scout ships have spotted a Latcher that is wandering the area between [location1] and [location2], using the place as its hunting ground. All commercial flights to this route have been stalled and authorities are offering [reward] to whoever can eliminate the Latcher.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting Grounds
MonsterMission.description: Scout reports indicate that a Latcher is wandering the area between [location1] and [location2], using the place as its hunting ground. All commercial flights to this route have been stalled and authorities are offering [reward] to whoever can eliminate the Latcher.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings in the area indicate an Leviathan size creature is within the area. All routes to [location1] and [location2] are closed off until the creature is eliminated. Administrators are rewarding a hefty [reward] marks to anyone who can kill the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings in the area indicate an Leviathan size creature is within the area. All routes to [location1] and [location2] are closed off until the creature is eliminated. Administrators are rewarding a hefty [reward] marks to anyone who can kill the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Nearby beacon stations have reported Seismic readings and massive electricity faults in their systems. They warned that there could be a Leviathan size creature between [location1] and [location2] emitting large amounts of electromagnetic pulses. Authorities have blocked off the route and are awarding [reward] marks to whoever can eliminate the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: The Resurrection
MonsterMission.description: Research vessels have reported a large Fractal Destroyer has been brought back to life between [location1] and [location2]! Authorities are offering [reward] marks to whoever can eliminate the large mobile creature before it causes havoc on the nearby outposts.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings in the area indicate an Leviathan size creature is within the area. All routes to [location1] and [location2] are closed off until the creature is eliminated. Administrators are rewarding a hefty [reward] marks to anyone who can kill the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Scattered reports indicate that something collossal has entered the area between [location1] and [location2]. All commercial flights have been grounded and authorities are offering a hefty [reward] marks to whoever can eliminate the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Captains have reported a swarm of Endworms between [location1] and [location2]. Commercial flights have been blocked off and so far no attack ship has gone and cleared them out yet. Authorities are offering [reward] marks to anyone brave enough to face 4 Endworms in the area.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Attacked ships have reported a pair of Rockworms between [location1] and [location2]. It is unknown if this is some kind of mating pair or a territorial dispute between the creatures as none can approach. Authorities are offering [reward] marks to anyone who can deal with this.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Seismetic readings in the area indicate an Leviathan size creature is within the area. All routes to [location1] and [location2] are closed off until the creature is eliminated. Administrators are rewarding a hefty [reward] marks to anyone who can kill the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Emergency Takedown
MonsterMission.description: Scout ships have spotted a horrifying Charybdis roaming the area between [location1] and [location2], wrecking havoc on the ecosystem. Without any nearby coaltion forces, authorities are rewarding [reward] marks to any attack ship to kill the beast before it causes anymore mayhem to the nearby outposts.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Nearby beacon stations have reported seismetic readings and massive electricity faults in their systems. They warned that there could be a Leviathan size creature between [location1] and [location2] emitting large amounts of electromagnetic pulses. Authorities have blocked off the route and are awarding [reward] marks to whoever can eliminate the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Hydrophone readings between [location1] and [location2] indicate a stealthy Leviathan size creature is stalking the area. All routes are closed and adminstrators are rewarding [reward] marks to whoever can eliminate the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Mobile Threat
MonsterMission.description: Attack ships are reporting a large mobile entity shooting at submarines from long distances. All commercial routes to [location1] and [location2] are closed off until the mobile threat is eliminated. A reward of [reward] marks have been prized to whoever can kill the creature.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Hunting grounds
MonsterMission.description: Attack ships have reported a large swarm of Cyclops between [location1] and [location2]. Commercial flights have been blocked off and so far no attack ship has gone and cleared them out yet. Authorities are offering [reward] marks to anyone brave enough to face 6 Cyclops in the area.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

message.text: The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
